moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: X Speed All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: We’re Standing Strong!
moves.effect: Blocks status conditions on the allied field of play. Removes all status conditions from all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

syncMove.name: Grateful Friend Flare Blitz
syncMove.description: The more the user’s Speed has been raised, the greater the power of this move.
